availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Churchwill H. Blakey (Logan Co, KY, sheriff and farmer)

body.p: Logan County, Kentucky, sheriff and farmer. Logan County, Kentucky, native. Married to Mary C. Becker Blakey on March 26, 1855. Father of Thomas Blakey, Theodore Blakey, Churchwill Blakey, Ellen Blakey. Sheriff in Russellville in 1850. Farmer in Logan County in 1860. Owned seven enslaved persons in Logan County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, Russellville, District 2 p. 135A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, District 1, p. 467.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, District 1, p. 302A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, Clay Precinct, p. 302A.
Kentucky Marriage Records on Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994027-994058, Logan County Marriages, p. 4.
Find A Grave, "Churchill Haden Blakey (1829-1895)," Memorial #110543021, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/110543021 (accessed December 3, 2018).
